thread.title: Donna Ford
thread.title_full: Redding Medical Inc. reviewed by Donna Ford

author: Donna Ford
title: Donna Ford
text: I ordered this for my daughter who is a very dedicated nurse if I may say she sent me a link and send mom please please I need this yes i goggled and checked things out 4 days later I have one very happy and pleased daughter, she tells me she loves it and shows it off cuz yes it has her full name and initals on it and its pearl pink.If my nurse says it's amazing its amazing. Thank you job well done
